formalpara.title: Internal help for this AMI command in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen: Action: GetConfig Synopsis: Retrieve configuration Privilege: config,all Description: A 'GetConfig' action will dump the contents of a configuration file by category and contents. Variables: Filename: Configuration filename (e.g. foo.conf)

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 to 1.4:
Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -1,7 +1,8 @@ Action: GetConfig Synopsis: Retrieve configuration - Privilege: config,all + Privilege: system,config,all Description: A 'GetConfig' action will dump the contents of a configuration - file by category and contents. - Variables: - Filename: Configuration filename (e.g. foo.conf) + file by category and contents or optionally by specified category only. + Variables: (Names marked with * are required) + *Filename: Configuration filename (e.g. foo.conf) + Category: Category in configuration file
